text: Dark Emissaries forces at the Mainland!
Dark forces prepare to ravage our Capital! They seek to use its power for their own dark and twisted purposes.
Through the restoration of the Albion waystones network we have forever weakened chaos and its servants in this world.
Dark Emissary forces to the North!
Dark forces muster to the north! Prepare the defenses, we shall beat them back from the Citadel! We will never fall to their dark and twisted plans.
Dark Emissary forces to the South!
Dark forces sighted on the southern shores! Their lay their greedy eyes on the Isle of Wights!
Restoration of the Albion waystones is underway! Dark things stir in anger as chaos energy is siphoned from the world.
We have uncovered all the Waystones on Albion. They must be rebuilt urgently if the world is to overcome the End Times.
We must uncover the Waystones scattered throughout Albion, though it will attract things of evil and chaos to our island. But this is our duty and responsibility to the world.
The Truthsayers have foreseen dark forces landing on Albion soil! Prepare the defences!
